nnsec.server
Interface WorkerIFace

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Worker
public interface WorkerIFace
extends java.rmi.Remote

WorkerIFace interface contains methods that will be exported to the remote users.

Method Summary
 int getNetScale()
          Method that permits to retrieve the neural network associated scale.
 java.lang.Object[][] getNetsList()
          Method that permits to retrieve informations about available nets from the server.

          Method that permits to retrieve outputs from the locked neural network (if there is one).
 int getWeightsUpperBound()
          Method that permits to retrieve an upper bound of the sum of neural network weights.
 long getWorkerGap()
          Method that permits to know the time spent by a Worker during last transition (useful for benchmark purpose).
 boolean lockNet(int id)
          Method that permits to lock a neural network for the use.
 void setCryptoEnvironment(java.lang.String puk, int svalue)
          Method that permits to set up the remote cryptosystem environment.
 void unlockNet()
          Method that permits to unlock a neural network previously locked.
 

Method Detail

lockNet

boolean lockNet(int id)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Method that permits to lock a neural network for the use.

Parameters:
id - neural network reference.
Returns:
true if the net exists, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - default exception, as indicated in the rmi reference manual.

Parameters:

                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
